author: civanch
body:
#### PR description:
Recently a requirement to simulate ZDC detector for heavy ion run was established. In this PR the approach is implemented to enable such simulation by extension of the existing modifier pp_on_PbPb_run3. The reasons: for pp run ZDC is not used, so simulation should be performed without transport from CMS to ZDC, in contrary, in the case of PbPb run PPS is not used but ZDC is enabled. The current simulation of ZDC bring a significant CPU penalty to simulation full shower in the detector with ZDC shower library disabled. This PR provide pp simulation without ZDC and ZDC simulation enabled for PbPb.

In order to get hits in ZDC both if the ZDC shower library is requested and when hits produced from Cerenkov signal in sensitive wires extra modifications are required: no check on volume name or on material name, optimized check on particle type.

With this PR no regression is expected, because recently incomplete solution to CMS->ZDC transport was implemented, which was in all cases enable even for pp run.
